object.name: FastMon_Evt_DataTransferId
object.description: Changes in data transfer id, within the time bin

object.name: FastMon_MetaContext_LATC_Master
object.description: Changes in the LATC Master key, within the time bin

object.name: FastMon_MetaContext_OpenMode
object.description: Changes of the LAT mode as read from the datagram open mode

object.name: FastMon_MetaContext_OpenMode_Changes
object.description: Mean value of the LAT mode changes as read from the datagram open mode. This is a counter, reset at the beginning of each run

object.name: FastMon_MetaContext_GPS_OUTofLock
object.description: Rate of number of seconds in which the GPS is out of lock. This rate should be ZERO, meaning that GPS is always in lock.

object.name: FastMon_NewSecond
object.description: Rate of 'NewSecond'; where 'NewSecond' is a variable set to 1 when current time (in units of seconds) is different to previous' evt time. The variable is 0 otherwise. The time is extracted as digi->getMetaEvent().time().current().timeSecs().

object.name: NormalizedRate_FastMon_MetaContext_GPS_OUTofLock
object.description: Normalized Rate of number of seconds in which the GPS is out of lock. This rate should be ZERO, meaning that GPS is always in lock. The normalization factor is Rate_NewSecond, that is the rate of time tones.

object.name: NormalizedRate_FastMon_MetaContext_GPS_OUTofLock_err
object.description: Error in the normalized Rate of number of seconds in which the GPS is out of lock. This rate should be ZERO, meaning that GPS is always in lock. The normalization factor is Rate_NewSecond, that is the rate of time tones.

object.name: FastMon_TemBug_Event
object.description: Rate of events with a TEM bug.

object.name: FastMon_Any_Error
object.description: Rate of events with any type of error.

object.name: FastMon_AnyThingButTEM
object.description: Rate of events with any type of error but TEM bug.

object.name: FastMon_GTCC_WORD_COUNT_PARITY_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_WORD_COUNT_PARITY_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TIMETONE_FLYWHEELING
object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_FLYWHEELING error bit.

object.name: FastMon_AEM_CONTRIB_ERROR

object.name: FastMon_GTCC_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_LAT_DATAGRAM_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a LAT_DATAGRAM_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TKR_CONTRIB_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a TKR_CONTRIB_ERROR error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_DATA_PARITY_ERROR error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a PHASE_ERROR error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_MISSING_TIMETONE error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a ACD_HEADER_PARITY_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TIMETONE_NULL_SOURCE_GPS
object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_NULL_SOURCE_GPS error bit.

object.name: FastMon_ERR_CONTRIB_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a ERR_CONTRIB_ERROR error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a LAT_CONTRIB_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_EBF_CONTRIB_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a EBF_CONTRIB_ERROR error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_MISSING_LATPPS error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a GTRC_SUMMARY_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TIMETONE_MISSING_CPUPPS
object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_MISSING_CPUPPS error bit.

object.name: FastMon_GTRC_PHASE_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a GTRC_PHASE_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_GTCC_HEADER_PARITY_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_HEADER_PARITY_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_GTCC_TIMEOUT_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_TIMEOUT_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TIMEOUT_ERROR
object.description: Rate of events with a TIMEOUT_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_TIMETONE_EARLY_EVENT
object.description: Rate of events with a TIMETONE_EARLY_EVENT error bit.

object.description: Rate of events with a GTCC_FIFO_ERROR error bit.

object.name: FastMon_Spacecraft_OrbitMode
object.description: Changes of the spacecraft orbit mode (3==inertially pointed, 5==sky survey)

object.name: FastMon_Spacecraft_OrbitInSAA
object.description: Changes of the spacecraft orbit in SAA flag (1==IN, 0==OUT)

object.name: FastMon_Spacecraft_Distance_To_SAA
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft ditance to the SAA (km)

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Latitude
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft latitude

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Longitude
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft longitude

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Altitude
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft altitude with respect to the earth surface (km)

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Pitch
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft pitch angle

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Roll
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft roll angle

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_Yaw
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft yaw angle

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_RockAngle
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft rock angle

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_XaxisRA
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft x axis right ascension

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_XaxisDec
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft x axis declination

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_ZaxisRA
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft z axis right ascension

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_ZaxisDec
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft z axis declination

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_EarthLimb
object.description: Mean value of the angle between the LAT Z axis and the Earth limb

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_EarthLimb_FOV
object.description: Mean value of the arc length of Earth limb in the LAT field of view

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_ZGalL
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft z axis galactic L coordinate

object.name: FastMon_SpaceCraft_ZGalB
object.description: Mean value of the spacecraft z axis galactic B coordinate

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_cutoff
object.description: Mean value of the Rigidity cutoff in GeV from approximation DipoleMoment divided by McIlwain_L squared

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_bb0
object.description: Mean value of BAbs divided by BEquator

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_InvariantLambda
object.description: Mean value of the geomagnetic invariant lambda (only valid for BB0_le_10)

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_InvariantLatitude
object.description: Mean value of the geomagnetic invariant latitude

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_InvariantRadius
object.description: Mean value of the geomagnetic invariant radius (only valid for BB0_le_10)

object.name: FastMon_GeoMag_McIlwainL
object.description: Mean value of the McIlwain L parameter

object.name: FastMon_TkrHits_TowerPlaneGTFE[16][36][24]
object.description: Vector reporting the accumulated (in the time bin) number of Tkr Hits for tower,plane, GTFE

object.name: FastMon_TkrHits
object.description: Mean number of Tkr Hits

object.name: FastMon_TkrHits_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Vector reporting the mean number of Tkr Hits for tower,plane

object.name: FastMon_NTkrHits_TowerPlane[16][36]
object.description: Rate of Tkr Hits in the time bin for each tower and plane, only for periodic triggers (Noise Hits).

object.name: FastMon_CalTowerCount
object.description: Mean number of Cal module with at least one CDE hit

object.name: FM_CalLogRHit_TowerCalLayerCalColumnFR[16][8][12][2][4]
object.description: Mean number of of hits in each Cal log end for each range

object.name: FastMon_AcdTileCount
object.description: Mean number of Acd tiles hit
